description: This file sets up an agent using the agno framework, interacts with it by sending messages, and prints the conversation history. It appears to be part of a conversational AI system, specifically related to a memory or interaction model within the litellm module.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent that manages conversation state and responses.

classes.name: LiteLLM
classes.description: A lightweight language model used by the agent.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Sends a message to the agent and prints the response.

methods.name: get_messages_for_session
methods.description: Retrieves the list of messages in the current session.

methods.name: model_dump
methods.description: Serializes message objects, including role and content.
